dublin_core.dcvalue: The use of real time telemedicine in providing quality health care in multiple specialties has been demonstrated in several small studies however a review of the literature reveals no large scale prospective or retrospective telemedicine studies in otolaryngology The telemedicine office at Naval Medical Center San Diego NMCSD acquired a large otolaryngology telemedicine patient database and this study reviews the otolaryngology telemedicine experience at NMCSD over an 18 month period
Otolaryngology--head and neck surgery : official journal of American Academy of Otolaryngology-Head and Neck Surgery
Teleotolaryngology: a retrospective review at a military tertiary treatment facility.
